operating_permit_number.title: Operating permit number
operating_permit_number.description: Unique permit number generated when application submitted. The format is OP-YYYY-#####, where OP means “Operating Permit” and YYYY is the year the permit application was submitted.

permit_status.title: Permit status
permit_status.description: Status of the operating permit at the time when the water quality report was submitted

address.title: Address
address.description: Address corresponding to the location of the mechanical system

mechanical_system_type.title: Mechanical system type
mechanical_system_type.description:
The water sample collection date, or the date the system became ACTIVE or INACTIVE.

Permit holders for cooling towers, decorative water features, and rainwater harvesting/non-potable water systems are required to report water quality data at regular intervals. They are also required to report when the system changes to an INACTIVE or ACTIVE status. Water quality samples are not required while a system is INACTIVE.

Refer to the Operating Permit webpage for required sampling frequencies

system_report_date.title: System report date
system_report_date.description:
The water sample collection date, or the date the system became ACTIVE or INACTIVE.

Permit holders for cooling towers, decorative water features, and rainwater harvesting/non-potable water systems are required to report water quality data at regular intervals. They are also required to report when the system changes to an INACTIVE or ACTIVE status. Water quality samples are not required while a system is INACTIVE.

Refer to the Operating Permit webpage for required sampling frequencies.

system_status.title: System status
system_status.description: Certain systems may be operated seasonally or year-round. Permit holders are required to report when their system is ACTIVE or INACTIVE. When a system is operating or on stand-by, it is ACTIVE. When it is drained and not operating, it is INACTIVE.

legionella_pneumophila.title: Legionella pneumophila
legionella_pneumophila.description:
The Legionella pneumophila result (total / all serogroups) as determined by an accredited laboratory using the culture method, in units of CFU per mL (Colony Forming Units per millilitre). 

Applicable to cooling towers, decorative water features and rainwater harvesting/non-potable water systems.

Refer to the Operating Permit webpage for the Legionella pneumophila standard.

escherichia_coli.title: Escherichia coli
escherichia_coli.description:
The Escherichia coli (E. coli) result as measured by an accredited laboratory, in units of CFU per 100 mL or MPN per 100 mL (Colony Forming Units or Most Probable Number per 100 millilitres, respectively). 

Applicable only to rainwater harvesting/non-potable water systems.

Refer to the Operating Permit webpage for the E.coli standard.

turbidity.title: Turbidity
turbidity.description:
The turbidity of the water sample as measured by an accredited laboratory, in units of NTU (nephelometric turbidity units). 

Applicable only to rainwater harvesting/non-potable water systems.

Refer to the Operating Permit webpage for the turbidity standard.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description:
The temperature of the water sample as measured by the operator, in units of degrees Celsius. 

Applicable only to rainwater harvesting/non-potable water systems.

Refer to the Operating Permit webpage for the temperature standard.

make_up_water.title: Make-up water
make_up_water.description:
The water sub-meter reading for the potable water make-up line.
Applicable only to rainwater harvesting/non-potable water systems installed after January 1, 2019.

make_up_water_units.title: Make-up water units
make_up_water_units.description:
The units of measurement for the water sub-meter reading on the 
potable water make-up line, in litres (L) or cubic metres (cu.m).

Applicable only to rainwater harvesting/non-potable water systems installed after January 1, 2019.

treated_non_potable_water.title: Treated non-potable water
treated_non_potable_water.description:
The water sub-meter reading for the treated non-potable water delivered by the system.

Applicable only to rainwater harvesting/non-potable water systems installed after January 1, 2019.

treated_non_potable_water_units.title: Treated non-potable water units
treated_non_potable_water_units.description:
The units of measurement for the water sub-meter reading on the treated non-potable water delivery line, in litres (L) or cubic metres (cu.m). 

Applicable only to rainwater harvesting/non-potable water systems installed after January 1, 2019.
